description:
Reentrancy in VertexCore.executeAction(uint256) (src/VertexCore.sol#261-298):
	External calls:
	- (allowed,reason) = guard.validatePreActionExecution(actionId) (src/VertexCore.sol#274)
	- (success,result) = action.target.delegatecall(abi.encodePacked(action.selector,action.data)) (src/VertexCore.sol#283)
	- (success,result) = action.target.call{value: action.value}(abi.encodePacked(action.selector,action.data)) (src/VertexCore.sol#285)
	- (allowed,reason) = guard.validatePostActionExecution(actionId) (src/VertexCore.sol#292)
	External calls sending eth:
	- (success,result) = action.target.call{value: action.value}(abi.encodePacked(action.selector,action.data)) (src/VertexCore.sol#285)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- ActionExecuted(actionId,msg.sender,action.strategy,action.creator,result) (src/VertexCore.sol#297)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [VertexCore.executeAction(uint256)](src/VertexCore.sol#L261-L298):
	External calls:
	- [(allowed,reason) = guard.validatePreActionExecution(actionId)](src/VertexCore.sol#L274)
	- [(success,result) = action.target.delegatecall(abi.encodePacked(action.selector,action.data))](src/VertexCore.sol#L283)
	- [(success,result) = action.target.call{value: action.value}(abi.encodePacked(action.selector,action.data))](src/VertexCore.sol#L285)
	- [(allowed,reason) = guard.validatePostActionExecution(actionId)](src/VertexCore.sol#L292)
	External calls sending eth:
	- [(success,result) = action.target.call{value: action.value}(abi.encodePacked(action.selector,action.data))](src/VertexCore.sol#L285)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [ActionExecuted(actionId,msg.sender,action.strategy,action.creator,result)](src/VertexCore.sol#L297)

description:
VertexCore.executeAction(uint256) (src/VertexCore.sol#261-298) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < action.minExecutionTime (src/VertexCore.sol#266)

[VertexCore.executeAction(uint256)](src/VertexCore.sol#L261-L298) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [block.timestamp < action.minExecutionTime](src/VertexCore.sol#L266)

description:
VertexPolicy._setRoleHolder(uint8,address,uint128,uint64) (src/VertexPolicy.sol#337-381) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- case1 = quantity > 0 && expiration > block.timestamp (src/VertexPolicy.sol#352)
	- ! (case1 || case2) (src/VertexPolicy.sol#354)
	- willHaveRole = quantity > 0 && expiration > block.timestamp (src/VertexPolicy.sol#362)
	- hadRoleQuantity && ! willHaveRole (src/VertexPolicy.sol#375)
	- ! hadRoleQuantity && willHaveRole (src/VertexPolicy.sol#376)
markdown:
[VertexPolicy._setRoleHolder(uint8,address,uint128,uint64)](src/VertexPolicy.sol#L337-L381) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [case1 = quantity > 0 && expiration > block.timestamp](src/VertexPolicy.sol#L352)
	- [! (case1 || case2)](src/VertexPolicy.sol#L354)
	- [willHaveRole = quantity > 0 && expiration > block.timestamp](src/VertexPolicy.sol#L362)
	- [hadRoleQuantity && ! willHaveRole](src/VertexPolicy.sol#L375)
	- [! hadRoleQuantity && willHaveRole](src/VertexPolicy.sol#L376)
